1.content:
Wendy pulled into the mostly empty car park, it was 8am on a Saturday and her work doesn't operate today. Not long has she worked at KITT headquarters which is a motor vehicle company but already has she found the workload astronomical. Therefore, to make a good impression she's come in to catch up on work. Leaving the car she she presses on a keypad on the door to lock it. It's a company car and has some fancy new security keyless entry. Inside the lift she selects the 38th floor, which is also the top floor. She feels pretty special getting to work up there and the view of the city is spectacular. Wendy takes a moment to admire herself in the mirror, it's not everyday the lift is so empty to do so. Wendy is 25 years old, has long black hair, fair skin and green eyes. She's of average weight and stands at 5 foot 8, her breasts are of slightly large but not huge, she's in proportion. Today she's wearing a long overcoat, it's a bit cold outside. Underneath she's wearing a business shirt and trousers, with heels. Even though it's a weekend she still figured it's best to wear work clothes. Suddenly the lift stops on level 13 and a man enters. "Working overtime too? Inquires Wendy who is a rather outgoing girl, which is probably how she got this job in the first place.

He looks at her for a second and checks the floor she's going too. "Oh same floor!" He replies.

Wendy doesn't recognise him, but the floor is pretty big and hectic so it doesn't surprise her too much. "Yeah, soo?" Responds Wendy.

He pauses for a moment again. "Oh I don't work here, I hired the floor to make a movie, only time is the weekend to use an office space. Don't worry I know what you're thinking, we won't get in your way or be too distracting." Responds the man.

Great, my desk is out in the open, I'll use the bosses office and close the door, no way will they be quiet. "Oh wow, that sounds like fun! I'll use one of the officers to keep out of your way." She responds with a giggle.

"Ah, okay cool. By the way that coat of yours, do you mind if we borrow it? Wardrobe has been a nightmare and our lead actress has turned up without one..."

Wendy looks at him surprised of his ask, she doesn't know this guy, she hasn't even got his name yet, but he's already asking a favour. "Sure, I won't need it inside, the aircon is pretty good. By the way what's your name? I'm Wendy" she responds whilst handing over the coat.

"Ben, nice to meet you Wendy" he said while taking the coat and folding it over his arms. The lift opens at their floor, Wendy rushes out and waves to Ben.

"Well I have a lot of work to do, have fun making your movie, I'll probably be here all day so you're free to return the coat whenever."

"Thanks!" Shouts Ben as Wendy rushes to the boss's office and closes the door. Taking a moment to admire the view as she waits for the computer to load.

Oh my god, why do I have so many emails, thinks Wendy as she starts sifting through the important ones. So many reports, this place is insane... Wendy lets out a sigh and kicks off her heels. An hour passes and Wendy is startled by a knock at the door. "Umm come in?" She shouts

The door slowly opens and Ben steps inside walking up to her desk. "Hey, just wanted to check if we haven't been too distracting?" Speaks Ben with his hand on her desk.

"Honestly, I've been so busy I haven't noticed" she responds raggedly.

"Oh excellent you see our movie is about..." continues Ben as he starts telling Wendy all about his film. In what seems like forever, Wendy becomes weary, wondering if he'll ever leave.

"Hey ummm sorry to interrupt, but i'm really busy at the moment." Interjects Wendy with Ben ceasing immediately. "Oh sorry I'll let you get back to it" he responds and walks out of the room "yeah thanks" responds Wendy as he closes the door.

Wendy continues with her work, but a good 15 minutes later she is interrupted by the door again. "Yeah!" She shouts.

The door opens and Ben pops his head in, "we're getting coffee do you want anything?" He asks.

"Nah I'm good" she responds and he closes the door. Another further 15 mins and a knock comes again.

"Yes?!" Shouts Wendy again starting to get frustrated.

The door once again opens "Oh we just started moving some things around wanted to make sure it wasn't annoying?" Said Ben. "It's fine! I really can't hear anything" says Wendy in a annoyed tone.

"Excellent" says Ben he closes the door. Ugh, why I can't focus is you coming in every 15 mins, I came in on the weekend to get away from this, thinks Wendy as she returns to her reports.

Knock knock. Oh come on it hasn't even been 5 mins now..."What now?!" She yells.

Ben enters the room this time Wendy doesn't let him speak. "Seriously, stop bothering me, I'm super busy. Whatever it is I'm not interested." Says Wendy.

"Oh I'm sorry, look this is important and unless it's critical again but we need a favour."

"I'm listening" says Wendy in a over it fashion.

"Look it's a bit awkward but our lead actresses outfit is not working at all, it's just terrible and even a post edit won't help... so can we borrow your shirt and trousers?" Asks Ben with limited confidence. Wendy's eyes widen "what the fuck kind of ask is that?"

"Look, I know it's a big ask, but we'll pay you, we just can't lose this opportunity to film here today." Responds Ben

"But" starts to say Wendy but is interrupted by Ben "If you help I'll leave you in peace unless it's critical." Wendy bites her lower lip, getting some extra cash would be good and she not getting through her work... at least he'll stop bothering her then. Fuck it.

"Fine, but you'll have to leave and I'll pass through the clothes, I'm not letting you see me in my underwear. She says. Ben nods and exits closing the door.

Wendy stands up, I can't believe I'm doing this, but at least I'll get some peace. Wendy unbuttons her white shirt pulling her arms out, placing it on the desk. Now standing in a black bra in her office she crosses her arms in embarrassment even though no one is there. Taking her hands she pushes them down her sides releasing herself from her trousers, revealing her matching black panties. Now on the floor she steps out of them and places them on the desk too. Taking both garments she walks over the door and opens it slightly, keeping the door as a cover she holds out her clothes. "There you go" she remarks and she feels a hand take them away.

"Thanks for that, you're a lifesaver Wendy" says Ben as Wendy closes the door. Wendy sakes her head in disbelief, what did I just do? Now standing barefoot and in wearing only underwear in her boss's office.

Wendy heads to the window and closes the blinds. Then sits back at the desk, the leather chair now feels colder without her trousers. Wendy immediately gets back into her work, hoping to get through it all. Tapping away, she feels almost liberated sitting their mostly undressed, she's never done anything like this. Wendy tries to stop her mind wandering at the thought of someone catching her. Lucky for her she believes the chance of that happening today is nonexistent.

Roughly two hours later. Knock knock. Wendy jumps in her seat, then settles herself. "Don't open the door!" She yells as she gets to the door and slightly opens it but doesn't peer out, instead staying behind.

"Sorry to bother you Wendy, we have another favour to ask..." ask Ben through the door. Wendy is trying to contain her frustration, she may have gotten two full hours, but isn't fully satisfied with being interrupted again.

"What is it now?" She asks sharply.

"What does your underwear look like?"

"Ummm excuse me?" Responds Wendy surprised, what is with this guy?

"What do they look like? You see we have a sex in the office scene to film and our lead's is positively ghastly, I mean who wears hello kitty underwear to work? Oh and don't get me started on the bra..." rants Ben.

"Let me guess you want to borrow them? Well listen here buddy, no way in..." says Wendy attempting to be authoritarian but is interrupted by Ben. "I promise not to interrupt you again, you'll be free to do whatever you need to do in there" he interjects quickly.

Wendy pauses for a second, the fact this jerk is asking her to get naked should infuriate her, but on the other hand he just hasn't stopped all day and she is way behind, this will put a stop to him bothering her, a promise is a promise. A little smirk goes across her face, being naked in the office and no one will ever know feels a little adventurous. Wendy unfastens her Bra revealing her gorgeously formed breasts and quickly pulls down her panties freeing her clean shaved pussy. She then hands them through the door as she did with her clothes. "Oh my god these are perfect, thank you! We'll pay you extra for them!" Says Ben as Wendy shuts the door and locks it this time just to be safe. Looking down at herself a sudden feeling of regret occurs. What did I just do? Circles though her mind. But she's safe, she keeps telling herself as she goes back to the computer sitting down on a colder feeling leather. Oh my this actually feel good! Time passes quickly as she gets her work completed undisturbed like promised. Wendy looks at the time, oh my god how is it that late! The sun would have gone down, but because of the blinds I didn't notice! She springs up, I better get going! Realising she needs her clothes but can't go out there her only option is to shout for attention. Running to the door her breasts bounced in splendour.

Wendy unlocks the door, leans over with the door as a shield and shouts. "Hello, Ben? Are you there I need to leave and need my clothes back?"

"Hello?! Anyone?!" She continues to repeat over and over in a panic, while she is also completely naked. Wendy stops, she can't even hear movement out beyond the door. Biting her lip, she ponders what to do...

11.content:
After all the shouting Wendy decides to poke her head out, alas no one can be seen. Panicking she closes the door swiftly. Where have they gone? Did they forget about me and leave, or go to another floor. Shaking at her loss of clothes she decides to call security. They'll know where the crew went. Heading over to the desk, she sits her naked ass back down on the chair and picks up the phone dialling security. The phone rings a few times. "Security" a male voice answers.

"Oh hi, it's Wendy from the 38th floor, there was a film crew up here today and they have something of mine, I was hoping you could tell me where they have gone?" Says Wendy in a calm tone not to raise suspicion.

"Ummm a film crew, I wasn't aware or have a record of one today? Did you get a name? They would have signed in today" queries the security officer.

Wendy tries to stay calm but stresses a little with his lack of knowledge of them.

"Yeah, I spoke to Ben" she replies.

"Ben? Let me check. Well the only person who signed in today was a Jacob who works on the 13th floor. You haven't signed in today, how did you get in?"

"Oh I used my card on the car park entrance and parked, I didn't know I had to sign in though" she says nervously.

"Right, maybe your Ben did the same, I'll check the records. Nope only you scanned in today and Jacob used the front entrance, he's also left the building hours ago."

Wendy freaks, Ben must be Jacob, I've been duped there is no film crew. Now I'm stuck up here without any clothes!

"Hello, are you still there?" Queries the security officer.

Wendy hesitates "Yeah sorry, I must have been mistaken, thanks for your help" Wendy attempts to hang up but is interrupted. "Wait! I need you still to sign in, it's the legal requirement."

"Oh I'm leaving now anyway..." she tries to say "then you'll need to sign in AND sign out at the same time."

"I can't..." stresses Wendy coving herself with one arm with the thought of being seen naked.

"I don't care if you're in a rush or whatever, you're not leaving this building until you have signed out. I'll block your exit access if I have too!" Shouts the security officer.

Fuck! What do I do! I can't let him see I'm naked! She panics.

"It's not that, you see the truth is I'm..." Wendy gulps. "Kind of without clothes, which is why I needed to track down Ben." Silence is on the line. "It's not what you think, I was tricked into giving them to him!"

"You're having a laugh right? I mean this has to be the best excuse I've heard for not signing in." Responds the security officer with a chuckle.

"No I'm serious!" Yells Wendy, not happy with him not believing her.

"Right then I'll bite, how does one get ticked into giving up their clothes?" He queries.

"Well he just kept bothering me, and I had so much work to do, then he claimed his actress had the wrong clothes, then later wrong underwear. He promised to stop bothering me if I helped him. So I did..." spoke Wendy rapidly trying to explain herself.

"Did it work?" He questions trying not to laugh.

"Well yeah, he stopped"

"He stopped alright, kept his promise so much that he left with you clothes. You know how stupid that was right haha?" Without helping himself he had to laugh, this was the dumbest thing he's ever heard personally. Wendy stays on the line and then eventually asks "so I can go now?"

"Well no, you still need to sign in and out"

"After what I just told you! I'm naked!"

"How about I come up and hand you the registry book?" Offers the security officer.

Wendy thinks for a moment and realises he can pass it through the door! "Sure! That will work!" She shouts excitingly.

"Ok, I'll be up in a second" he says and hangs up the phone. Wendy hangs up her receiver slumps in the chair, her heart feels like it'll rip through her chest. But at least now once she gets the signing out of the way then she can leave to her car, knowing no one else is in the building. Not wanting to leave anything to chance she stands up in all her naked glory and positions herself to open the door using it as cover. Moments later a knock comes to the door and Wendy pops her head out to see an older man wearing a building security outfit. "So its true! I still had my doubts" He remarks with a surprised look on his face.

"Yep... can I have the book now?" She asks lacking confidence.

"Yep as soon as I see your employee ID"

Wendy freaks she left her ID in the car with her swipe pass!

"Don't tell me he stole your ID too?" He says.

"Would you believe me if I said yes?" Responds Wendy and is left with silence. "Alright fine I left it in the car with my swipe card"

"Of course you did... you know you must wear it at all times in the building, even on weekends?"

"Sorry I didn't know, can I please just have the book please?" Pleads Wendy cowering uncomfortably behind the door.

"No, because I need to see that ID. I'll have to escort you down to your car, see it and then you can sign. After that you're free to leave." Responds the security officer, in an annoyed tone.

Wendy wants to die of shame, can't he give me some leeway? I mean seriously this isn't any other situation! "Please don't make me do this! Can't you make an exception? Just this once?" She continues to plead.

"No, it's either your embarrassment or my job, and I don't choose my job" he says rather sternly.

Wendy starts breathing heavily, with the knowledge she's about to expose herself to this man plus have him escort her completely naked. Covering herself with her arms she uses her bare foot to open the door fully. The security guard stands before her wide eyed at this beautiful woman standing naked before him, her long black hair flowing down. Squirming where she stands, she notices his name tag say Peter. "Can we go now Peter?"

He nods and they both walk towards the lifts. On the weekend only one runs, it's some power saving thing for modern buildings. Wendy struggles to contain her feelings, wanting to cry in embarrassment standing next to this fully clothed man, who she notices doesn't stop himself from looking at her. *ding* the lift arrives and they both walk in. Wendy is made more conscious of her state by seeing herself in the mirrors and she goes a shade of red.

Peter presses the button but neither of them were expecting what happens next...

Why isn't it working? She screams internally then realises it needs power! Hitting her hand on the steering wheel, and placing her head on top sobbing at her failed escape attempt. Eventually she pulls her head up, knowing she has to follow one of the options Peter laid out if she wants to get out of here.

If she resets the power she could just get back to her car and escape. But she could make the situation worse. Otherwise, calling the fire department from the front desk would get her and Peter out but means more people will see her naked...

15.content:
What to do... what to do... what to do...

Wendy found that she couldn't concentrate on that question; what to do? An entire day of reading reports and crunching numbers had left her feeling a little vague, like her mind was foggy. What were her options... what were her...

She yawned. "Oh this is no good." she muttered to herself. "I need to wake up a little."

She opened the door once more and peered outside. Absolutely certain that the office was empty, Wendy opened the door fully and stepped outside. With one arm draped across her breasts and her free hand covering her crotch, Wendy began to move between the office stalls, their walls high enough to cover her body but low enough so that she could see over them. There was no sound other than the gentle pad of her bare feet against the carpet.

She felt a little silly as she made her way into the break area, a large recess to the side of the office that contained a fridge, a sink, some cupboards, some countertops and a kettle. She was coming to make a coffee to wake herself up, but the little trek across the office was providing more than enough stimulation! Nonetheless, she hurriedly rooted through the cupboard until she found a packet of instant coffee and an empty mug. She filled the kettle with water and turned it on, then leaned against the counter to wait. She looked over the office, no longer bothering to cover herself. She started to laugh. Bare ass naked in the middle of the office and she was making coffee! She shook her head; so ridiculous.

The little adventurous spark stirs within her again. Grinning, she makes her way back towards the boss' office, not bothering to cover herself this time. Once there, she reaches under the desk and pulls out her heels. She slips them on. She steps outside into the office and, hands on hips, begins to walk between the aisles. She stops at one of the desks and sits on top of it.

"Why Madison, I need the monthly report immediately." she said with mock seriousness. "Never mind that I'm naked; you just focus on your job!"

She sauntered between the empty desks, imagining them filled with shocked and aroused co-workers. She found herself giggling again.

Wendy jumped with fright as she heard a loud 'clicking' sound. Her heart thudded against her chest. It was with some relief, a moment later, that she realised it was just the sound of the kettle boiling. Abandoning the heels, she jogged over to the break area and unplugged the boiling kettle. She was just about to pour it out when she heard the unmistakable sound of voices approaching! She peered out of the break area and saw Ben in the hallway outside talking to somebody wearing headphones and carrying a large microphone. Wendy could see them through the glass doors leading outside, although neither of them were looking into the office. It looked pretty obvious they were about to come inside, though!

What does Wendy do?

153121.content:
Strolling through the parking lot naked as a jaybird, Wendy managed to get to her car, only to find that her cars keys weren't in her purse! Panicking, she thought back over her day, searching through her purse, and remembered that she had a cabinet key in her keychain, and that she'd left her keys in the cabinet in her office. No biggy, she'd just have to go back up to her office, easy in and out.

Strolling back through the lobby, she didn't notice how the janitor sweeping the floor was staring at her while he swept the same spot over, and over again, watching her disappear down the hall to the elevator. Absentmindedly checking her phone for the time, she saw that she still had time before her show came on, it'd be close, but if she didn't get distracted, then everything would be fine.

Once back in her floor, she made a beeline for her office, pausing briefly to double check that nothing was out of place on her outfit, she still had a nagging feeling that she'd forgotten something, but couldn't place it. Spying her keys in the cabinet, she grabbed them and made her way back down, waving to the IT employee who'd come in a bit late to double check on Alice's computer problems. Wendy didn't notice how the IT lady stared, mouth open as Wendy walked past.

Still feeling like she'd forgotten something she tried to remember what exactly it could be, thinking back on everything while she rode the elevator down, she remembered! She needed to pick up eggs on her way home! So simple, how'd she forget that?

Content that she'd remembered what she needed to do on her way home, she walked by the same janitor, who ended up mopping his shoes as Wendy's heels clicked passed him.

Once she crossed the parking lot for the third and final time, she slid into her convertible and began to drive to the Price-Mart to grab her eggs. She adjusted herself a bit in her leather seat, she didn't remember the drive to work being this uncomfortable, especially with the seatbelt rubbing between her breasts, but that was the 'price of fashion' she supposed.

She got a few doubletakes from drivers and passengers, but she either didn't notice, or paid them no mind, focused on grabbing the eggs and getting home in time for her show. Pulling into the Price-Mart parking lot, she started grabbing her purse when...
153121.title: Made it to her car without incident (still thin...

choices: Her outfit, or lack thereof
1531211.content:
Her coupon! Smiling, Wendy grabbed her coupon and put it in her purse before stepping out of her car and heading into the store, for a Saturday afternoon, it was pretty empty, "It'll probably get pretty busy while I'm shopping." Wendy said to herself.

Grabbing a hand basket in case she decided on buying anything else, Wendy walked calmly into the store, butt naked, ignoring the stares she was getting from the few other shoppers. As she was walking down the refrigerated aisle, she shivered a bit at the cold.

"They must've turned the AC up in here." She said, rubbing her arms to keep warm. As she was checking the eggs to make sure that they weren't cracked, an employee nervously approached her.

"Uh, ma'am?" He said, trying hard not to stare, "Did you forget something?" He gestured to her lack of attire.

Looking down, Wendy still didn't notice what he was talking about, "Uh, no. I just came from the office, I know I've got everything." She said confidently.

The poor employee, for his part was trying to think of what kind of office had its female employees naked, and if he could get a job there.

While the boy was stuck in his fantasy, Wendy continued on her way to checkout when she realized something very, VERY important.
1531211.title: She remembered her coupon for eggs!

choices: Wendy has to leave her office again
Jane revisits Wendy
Other
1532.content:
Once at the printer, Wendy started sorting out the papers that got printed when she heard footsteps coming down the aisle, what to do?!

"Just act normal," she said to herself, "if you act normal, so will everybody else."

Holding her papers tight, Wendy strolled out into the aisle and saw Jane looking at a clipboard, "Hi Jane!" Wendy said excitedly, inwardly dreading the response.

But Jane didn't even look up from the clipboard, "Hey Wendy," she casually stepped around her and walked up to printer, taking a sheet off and putting it on the copier, "working overtime?"

Wendy hummed in agreement, not believing that Jane didn't notice, "Why are you here?"

Jane turned around and grabbed a few sheets of blank paper, somehow not seeing Wendy's bare body as she did so, "Just getting some forms filled out for Mrs. Vahs, you know how she is."

Wendy nodded, Vahs was notorious for hounding employees for paperwork, almost like that was her sole purpose for even working at the company. When Jane was done copying her papers, she and Wendy walked back, talking all the way as Jane organized her papers, separating as Wendy turned to go to her office, and Jane to go to Vahs.

As Jane left she looked back to say something to Wendy when she saw her coworkers naked backside swaying and jiggling behind her. Closing her eyes tight and reopening them, she only saw Wendy's office door closing, "I must be overworked," she muttered to herself, "I'm seeing things."
1532.title: Somebody's coming, hide!  Or act casual?

info.brief_description: This is an ENF story of Wendy and her unexpected trouble at her work office.
info.description:
This is an ENF story of Wendy an office worker who ends up in an embarrassing situation at her workplace. It's actually based on a dream I had last night which ended on the first chapter. So I thought I would let others put their spin on how it goes.

Simple rules, no TF, scatt and rape, sex must be consensual. Don't kill off Wendy. Violence is okay limited unless it goes too far. If you're not sure inbox me and check.

Otherwise have fun with it.
